title: 40: Sorry, He Hates You
description:
Ladies…is he only fucking you through the hole of his boxers? Do you only get called over at 3 AM after he’s drank 20 beers? You may be entitled to financial compensation.
This week Sofia gets DEEP in her bag of honesty for both girls AND guys. Listen, we’ve all been the girl who has overplayed our role in a guy's life, only for him to view you as just a personal sex doll. Joined by producer Alex, Sofia breaks down ALL of the signs that you NEED to watch out for so you can see past your rose colored glasses and realize that…he’s just not into you, just by the way he fucks you. But don’t worry, you’re about to learn A BUNCH of tricks so you can flip that shit right back on him. You thought you were a “savage” before? Just wait. Next, Sofia taps into the hellish world that is dating apps. Men, you will learn EXACTLY why you’re struggling to find a match, and why no one is responding to your messages…PSA: LEAVE FISH PHOTOS IN THE CAMERA ROLL. Even though it’s a hot girl summer, Sloot University is ALWAYS in session - and you’re gonna be glad you attended these classes.
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 
Episode promo codes:

Talk Space: http://www.talkspace.com/ promo code SOFIA for $100 off
